title: Elegant Peppers Country Escape
description: Enjoy a romantic country manor getaway at Peppers Manor House in the tranquil NSW Southern Highlands, located just 90 minutes from both Sydney and Canberra. Spend two nights in charming comfort and enjoy a bottle of bubbly on arrival, a round of golf at the 18-hole Mt Broughton Golf Club, a food and beverage credit, a wine tasting and a tasting plate of delicious local produce and more for two.

title: Peppers Heritage Country Escape Just Ninety Minutes from Sydney
description: Experience old-world charm and elegant relaxation on a tranquil country retreat at Peppers Manor House, just 90 minutes’ drive from Sydney and under two hours from Canberra. Adjacent to a championship golf course and home to a fine-dining restaurant, this serene Southern Highlands estate is the perfect spot for a romantic escape of two or three nights including a round of golf, welcome bottle of sparkling wine, local wine tasting and tasting plate, credit to use at the award-winning Katers Restaurant and more.
offer_address: Kater Road, Sutton Forest, New South Wales 2577, Australia

title: NSW Peppers Heritage Southern Highlands Escape just 90 Minutes from Sydney with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience old-world charm and elegant relaxation at Peppers Manor House, a tranquil country retreat just a 90-minute drive from Sydney and under two hours from Canberra. Adjacent to a championship golf course and home to a spectacular restaurant, this serene Southern Highlands estate is the perfect spot for a romantic escape. Discover a world of sophisticated country glamour as you wander the lush estate gardens, lounge by the pristine outdoor pool and cosy up by the roaring fireplace in The Great Hall. Whether you're looking to escape the bustling city or searching for the ultimate couples retreat, this heritage sanctuary has everything you need to create unforgettable memories.

Outdoor adventurers will be spoilt for choice at Peppers Manor House - spend the weekend exploring the Southern Highlands on horseback, fishing in the lush Kangaroo Valley or touring the area's many vineyards. Enjoy a nature walk or visit a thunderous waterfall in one of the many nearby national parks, see the remarkable limestone caves of the Wombeyan Karst Conservation Reserve or visit a local market to pick up unique arts and crafts. Meanwhile, golf lovers will be thrilled to explore the 18-hole Mount Broughton Golf and Country Club, conveniently located adjacent to the Peppers property.
offer_address: Kater Road, Sutton Forest, New South Wales 2577, Australia

title: Peppers Heritage Southern Highlands Escape 90 Minutes from Sydney with Dining Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
You won’t have to venture far from Sydney’s CBD to experience old-world charm and country tranquility - Peppers Manor House, a scenic 90-minute drive from Sydney, melds all the warm features of a homely country estate with elegantly refurbished interiors. Surrounded by Southern Highland flora and adjacent to a championship golf course, guests are spoiled with opportunities to embrace nature. Tee up for a round on the green, play a game of croquet or relax by the pool under the afternoon sun - take each day at your leisure.

For dining, the award-winning Katers Restaurant is close at hand, serving nostalgic country fare against roaring wood fireplaces, and the onsite bar and pool table make for a cosy wind-down. With recently revamped interiors and serene gardenscapes, this Southern Highlands estate is the perfect country retreat.
offer_address: Kater Road, Sutton Forest, New South Wales 2577, Australia

title: Heritage Peppers Country Getaway in the Southern Highlands

Enjoy serene romance with a two or three-night getaway including a round of golf at the championship course, welcome bottle of sparkling wine, local wine tasting and tasting plate, credit to use at the award-winning Katers Restaurant and more.
